input.sentences: there were several participants in the race up in the mountains .
this is one participant coming around the corner . the cameras are covering his progress .
here are several racers bottle up on this narrow path .
she looks like she 's really moving !
the house on top of the mountain must be where the finish line is .
output.sentences: The entire family, kids included wanted to join.
So on your marks get set go!
We all hiked the trail at a great pace giving each other motivation to get to the top.
Finally we all reached the little old house on top of the hill and camped out for the night.
